com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2

Class EPPDateFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.EPPDateFormatter

  • public class EPPDateFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods to parse and generate XML date/dateTime strings. An XMLGregorianCalendar is used as the object representation of the XML date strings, since it provides compliance with the XML date and dateTime data types. It also supports getting an instance of java.util.Calendar representing the XMLGregorianCalendar object returned. Uses the maintenance and user level loggers.

    • Method Detail

      • toXSDate

        public static java.lang.String toXSDate(java.util.GregorianCalendar date)
        Generate a UTC normalised representation of the given date. Normalisation is performed to prevent loss of time zone information when truncating a dateTime input to a date lexical representation.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be converted to XSD format
        Returns:
        the formatted string

      • toXSDateTime

        public static java.lang.String toXSDateTime(java.util.GregorianCalendar date)
        Generate a UTC normalised lexical XML string representation of the given date and time.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be converted to XSD format
        Returns:
        the formatted string

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the formatted string
